main event: A disc-shaped object was observed moving horizontally from west to east in Worland, Wyoming on October 13, 1960.
interesting points: The object was disc-shaped, about 50-60 feet in diameter, and bright yellow-orange in color,The object moved at an estimated speed of 900 mph,It hovered briefly after slowing down,No trail or exhaust was observed emanating from the object,The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds.
witness description: The observation was conducted visually from the ground, with binoculars.
